author: andschwa
body: https   github.com dotnet buildtools tree master src xunit.console.netcore . build tty.sh mono nuget.exe list  Prerelease  Source https   www.myget.org F dotnet buildtools  https   www.myget.org gallery dotnet buildtools   It's available but pulls in .NET Core dependencies. We should hold off on this until we're using NuGet for all our packages. It looks like it'll be an all or nothing deal; should also be done with dnu dnx dnvm. title: Download xUnit packages via NuGet
